Extinct For a Reason

Published by Simon & Schuster

In 2012, my writing partner, Scott Cooney, and I conceived the idea of a book of “Failimals”: animals who went extinct long ago, due to evolutionary disadvantageous physical features.


We developed a book treatment, and pitched it to book agents. Our book agent pitched the book to 20 different publishers. We received 2 offers. We accepted an offer from Simon & Schuster’s Gallery Books. In 2013, Extinct For A Reason was published.
